text:
Hi,

I have tried Apache 2 on FreeBSD and NetBSD, on FreeBSD when i 
launch it, he bind on all ipv4 and ipv6 adresse.
but on NetBSD he only bind on IPv6, so i can't use it on IPv4 and IPv6 in 
the same time.
creator: jeb@jeb.com.fr

text:
On NetBSD you'll need to add an additional listen statement like the one
shown below in order to accept IPv4 connections too:

  Listen 0.0.0.0:80
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
Thanks for this info, i just want to add that Listen [0::0]:80 is also required 
for the ipv6 binding, but i am wondering why he don't automatically bind 
on both ipv4 and ipv6
creator: jeb@jeb.com.fr
